title: Notice
text_content: Notice This archive of previously issued food recalls and allergy alerts is provided for reference and research purposes. Users should note that the products listed in the archive have been subject to removal from the marketplace or appropriate corrective action. Food recalls or allergy alerts are not an indication of the food safety status of products produced at a later date.
question: What is the purpose of the provided archive of food recalls and allergy alerts?
answer: The archive of previously issued food recalls and allergy alerts is provided for reference and research purposes.
